IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ADAMS STATE UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION EXISTS TO PROMOTE AND FURTHER THE INTERESTS, OBJECTIVES AND PURPOSES OF THE UNIVERSITY; TO SEEK AND RECEIVE GIFTS, LEGACIES AND GRANTS OF MONEY OR PROPERTY AND TO ADMINISTER SUCH FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE UNIVERSITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ADAMS STATE UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION EXISTS TO PROMOTE AND FURTHER THE INTERESTS, OBJECTIVES AND PURPOSES OF THE UNIVERSITY; TO SEEK AND RECEIVE GIFTS, LEGACIES AND GRANTS OF MONEY OR PROPERTY AND TO ADMINISTER SUCH FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE UNIVERSITY.
IRS990.Desc: SCHOLARSHIPS, GRANTS, AWARDS, AND OTHER ALLOCATIONS FOR THE BENEFIT OF ADAMS STATE UNIVERSITY STUDENTS, FACULTY, AND STAFF. THE FOUNDATION ASSISTED 263 RECIPIENTS TO FUND THEIR EDUCATION. THERE WERE NO DONATED SERVICES IN 2021.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES ON INCOME SUBSTANTIALLY RELATED TO THE FOUNDATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSE UNDER SECTION 501(c)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. UNDER COLORADO STATUTES, ANY ORGANIZATION RECEIVING EXEMPTION FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES IS ALSO EXEMPT FROM COLORADO INCOME TAXES.The Foundation files federal income tax returns. The federal income tax returns prior to fiscal year 2019 are closed. The Foundations policy for evaluating uncertain income tax positions is to only take income tax positions that are more likely than not to be sustained if the taxing authorities were to examine the positions. If applicable, the Foundation classifies interest and penalties as interest expense. There is no cumulative effect of the change on net assets of applying the provisions of FASB ASC 740-10, in the statements of financial condition.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Grantmaker's Description of How Grants are Used
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS ARE AWARDED THROUGH AN APPLICATION AND SELECTION PROCESS. SEVERAL SCHOLARSHIPS ARE AWARDED THROUGH A COMMITTEE AND THE COMMITTEE COMMUNICATES WITH THE FINANCIAL AID OFFICE OF THE COLLEGE AND THE DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION AS TO WHO THE RECIPIENTS ARE. THE FINANCIAL AID OFFICE ADDS THE SCHOLARSHIP TO THE STUDENT'S BILL AND THE FOUNDATION IS BILLED FROM THE BUSINESS OFFICE. GPA AND NEED ARE TWO COMPONENTS OF SCHOLARSHIP AWARD CRITERIA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WILL REVIEW THE FORM 990 WITH THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN A DISCLOSURE STATEMENT. THE SIGNED STATEMENT INCLUDES A PARAGRAPH INDICATING THAT THE BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO UPDATE THEIR DISCLOSURE STATEMENT AT ANY TIME THE BOARD MEMBER BECOMES AWARE OF AN INTEREST THAT CONSTITUTES A CONFLICT.THERE HAVE BEEN NO KNOWN POLICY VIOLATIONS TO ENFORCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANY CHANGES IN SALARY ARE WORKED INTO THE BUDGET WHICH REQUIRES BOARD APPROVAL. AS OF NOW THE ALUMNI STAFF IS COMPENSATED BY ADAMS STATE UNIVERSITY AND NOT THROUGH THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANY CHANGES IN SALARY ARE WORKED INTO THE BUDGET WHICH REQUIRES BOARD APPROVAL. AS OF NOW THE ALUMNI STAFF IS COMPENSATED BY ADAMS STATE UNIVERSITY AND NOT THROUGH THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT THE OFFICE OF THE FOUNDATION.
